mapper.select: SELECT u.USER_ID , u.CO_ID , u.USER_NM , u.USER_EML , u.USER_IMG , u.SIGN_IMG , ei.DEPT_NO , FN_GET_DEPT_NO_NM(ei.DEPT_NO, u.CO_ID) AS DEPT_NM , ei.JBGD_CD , FN_GET_CST_CD_NM2CO(ei.JBGD_CD, u.CO_ID) AS JBGD_NM , ei.JBTL_CD , FN_GET_CST_CD_NM2CO(ei.JBTL_CD, u.CO_ID) AS JBTL_NM , vg.VAC_GRNT_NO , vg.VAC_TP , FN_GET_MNG_CD_NM(vg.VAC_TP ) AS VAC_NM , vg.VAC_GRNT_YMD , vg.VAC_GRNT_DAYS , vg.VLD_YMD , vu.VAC_USE_DAYS , vg.VAC_GRNT_DAYS - NVL(vu.VAC_USE_DAYS, 0) AS REMAIN_VAC_DAYS FROM (SELECT * FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ) u INNER JOIN EMP_INFO ei ON ei.USER_ID = u.USER_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM VAC_GRNT WHERE VLD_YMD >= SYSDATE AND VAC_GRNT_YMD <= SYSDATE AND VLD_YMD >= SYSDATE ) vg ON vg.USER_ID = u.USER_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT NVL(sum(vu.CNY_DAY), 0) AS VAC_USE_DAYS , vu.USER_ID , vu.VAC_GRNT_NO FROM VAC_USE vu GROUP BY USER_ID , vu.VAC_GRNT_NO ) vu ON vu.USER_ID = u.USER_ID AND vu.VAC_GRNT_NO = vg.VAC_GRNT_NO

mapper.select: SELECT d.DR_NO , d.USER_ID , d.DR_STTS_CD , d.DR_STRG , d.DR_DT , d.DEL_YN , d.DEL_DT , d.DRFT_TITLE , do.DR_OPN_NO , do.USER_ID AS DRFT_OPN_USER_ID , do.OPNN_CN , do.DR_OPNN_DT , do.DEL_YN AS DRFT_OPN_DEL_YN , do.DEL_DT AS DRFT_OPN_DEL_DT , da.DRFT_FL_NO , da.FILE_NM , da.FILE_UUID , da.FILE_PATH , da.FILE_EXTN , da.FILE_SIZE , da2.USER_ID AS DRFT_ATRZ_USER_ID , da2.ATRZ_SN , da2.ATRZ_CD , da2.ATRZ_STTS_CD , da2.ATRZ_DT , u.USER_NM AS ATRZ_USER_NM , FN_GET_DEPT_NO_NM(ei.DEPT_NO, u.CO_ID) AS ATRZ_DEPT_NM , FN_GET_CST_CD_NM2CO(ei.JBGD_CD, u.CO_ID) AS JBGD_NM , u.USER_IMG , u.SIGN_IMG FROM ( SELECT * FROM DRFT d2 WHERE d2.DR_NO = #{drNo} ) d LEFT JOIN DRFT_OPN do ON do.DR_NO = d.DR_NO LEFT JOIN DRFT_ATCH da ON da.DR_NO = d.DR_NO INNER JOIN DRFT_ATRZ da2 ON da2.DR_NO = d.DR_NO INNER JOIN EMP_INFO ei ON ei.USER_ID = da2.USER_ID INNER JOIN USERS u ON u.USER_ID = da2.USER_ID ORDER BY d.DR_NO, da2.ATRZ_SN

mapper.select: WITH T AS ( SELECT da.DR_NO , da.USER_ID , da.ATRZ_SN , da.ATRZ_CD , da.ATRZ_STTS_CD , da.ATRZ_DT FROM ( SELECT * FROM DRFT_ATRZ WHERE ATRZ_CD = 'DR001' AND USER_ID = #{userId} AND ATRZ_STTS_CD IS NULL ) da INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM DRFT_ATRZ WHERE ATRZ_STTS_CD = 'DS001' )da3 ON da3.DR_NO = da.DR_NO AND da3.ATRZ_SN IN da.ATRZ_SN - 1 UNION SELECT DR_NO , USER_ID , ATRZ_SN , ATRZ_CD , ATRZ_STTS_CD , ATRZ_DT FROM ( SELECT * FROM DRFT_ATRZ WHERE ATRZ_SN = 1 AND USER_ID = #{userId} ) da ), F AS ( SELECT d.DR_NO , d.USER_ID , FN_GET_USER_NM(d.USER_ID) AS USER_NM , d2.DEPT_NM , d.DR_STTS_CD , d.DR_DT , d.DEL_YN , d.DRFT_TITLE FROM DRFT d INNER JOIN EMP_INFO ei ON ei.USER_ID = d.USER_ID INNER JOIN DEPT d2 ON d2.DEPT_NO = ei.DEPT_NO ), J AS ( SELECT da.DR_NO , MAX(da.ATRZ_SN) AS MAX_ATRZ_SN FROM DRFT_ATRZ da GROUP BY da.DR_NO ) SELECT F.DR_NO , F.USER_ID , F.DR_STTS_CD , F.USER_NM , F.DEPT_NM , F.DR_STTS_CD , F.DR_DT , F.DEL_YN , F.DRFT_TITLE , T.USER_ID AS DRFT_ATRZ_USER_ID , T.ATRZ_SN , T.ATRZ_CD , T.ATRZ_STTS_CD , T.ATRZ_DT , J.MAX_ATRZ_SN FROM T LEFT JOIN F ON F.DR_NO = T.DR_NO LEFT JOIN J ON J.DR_NO = T.DR_NO ORDER BY F.DR_NO DESC
